articles.title: FIIs turn net buyers last week, pouring in Rs 4,300 crore; is it comeback time? - The Economic Times
articles.description: Foreign portfolio investors net bought Indian equities worth Rs 4,398 crore last week, according to NSDL data. This is against them selling shares worth over 2,500 crore in the preceding week.
